segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked if she keeps standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching so high for those cookies, and that stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to slip any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be flooded if someone doesn’t turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone seems when there’s so much chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and tidy, unlike this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught before they finish taking all the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just begging for someone to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
